content:
The Uber of Internet. Using payment layer like Althea.

3 KB/s = 0,05 eM$
6 KB/s = 0,09 eM$
15 KB/s = 0,25 eM$
25 KB/s = 0,50 eM$
50 KB/s = 1,90 eM$
100 KB/s = 5,90 eM$
500 KB/s = 8,90 eM$
1 MB/s = 14,90 eM$
5 MB/s = 29,90 eM$
10 MB/s = 79,90 eM$ (50 eM$ discount)
20MB/s = 109,90 eM$
40 MB/s = 169,90 eM$
80 MB/s = 289,90 eM$
160 MB/s = 429,90 eM$ (100 eM$ discount)
320 MB/s = 659,90 eM$ (200 eM$ discount)
640 MB/s = 919,90 eM$ (400 eM$ discount)
1GB/s = 1.239,90 eM$ (600 eM$ discount)
5GB/s= 1.679,90 eM$ (800 eM$ discount)
10GB/s = 6.995,90 eM$ (1400 eM$ discount)
20GB/s = 11.590,90 eM$ (2400 eM$ discount)
40GB/s = 19.180,90 eM$ (4000 eM$ discount)

Accept G1/DU
title: Mesh Network table
